resources.string: Disable camera permissions, you will not be able to use camera related functions~
Disable contact permissions, you will not be able to use contact related features~
Disabling location information permission will not get device location information~
Disable microphone permission, you will not be able to use the recording or call recording function~
Disabling phone permissions, you will not be able to use device phone related features~
Disable SMS permission, you will not be able to use device SMS related function~
Disable storage space permissions, you will not be able to use the file read and write or delete function ~
